item.title: 01 - Acid Rain
item.description: Date: 01/10/2022 Present [[Heroes/Wunce|Wunce]] [[Heroes/Spindlesticks|Spindlesticks]] [[Heroes/Wizarak|Wizarak]] [[Heroes/Hargo|Hargo]] [[Heroes/Dianarys|Dianarys]] [[Heroes/Abaddon|Abaddon]] ![[Chapters/01.png | center | 500]] Story [[The Adventurers]] made their way to a village, in need of assistance.

item.title: Cornice Rice
item.description: The Alderman of the village where the adventurers travelled to in [[Chapters/01 - Acid Rain]]

item.title: Egregious Confounder
item.description: Resident of [[Locations/Falstaff]] Note to Adventurers Sent a note to the party asking for the corpse of [[Enemies/Vellathdros|Vellathdros]] to be delivered to Falstaff

item.title: Falstaff
item.description: A bigger town Residents [[NPCs/Egregious Confounder|Egregious Confounder]]

item.title: Vellathdros
item.description: Vellathdros, the Black Dragon ![[Enemies/Vellathdros.png|600]] “The only thing we have to fear now is his Acid Rain” - Wunce Found in the forests to the south of [[Locations/Falstaff|Falstaff]], this black dragon enslaved bandits to raid villages and travellers, acquiring whatever metal treasures could be found to increase it’s hoard.
